homePage.prePostText: You just completed most of the __postTestTopicDesc__ topic. Let us see how much you have learnt in this before working on the new topic!
homePage.completedText:
You have attempted this topic 20 times already.
There are other topics active for you. Please work on the other topics and come back to this when you complete them.
homePage.timedTestText: You are due for a timed test, click ok to continue with it
homePage.lastTopicText: You have completed the last topic. Let us see how much you have learnt!
homePage.timedTestMsg:
You are due for giving a timed test.
Click __link__ to continue.
homePage.title: Home

wildCard.head: Here is an opportunity to earn __reward__ by answering a wild card question!!!
wildCard.sub: A wild card question is a question that may not be related to the topic that you are currently doing. It is asked to test your alertness and ability to answer a question from other topics. You will __reward__ for answering a wild card question correctly. Remember that wild card questions will not affect your performance in the regular topics.

timedTestPage.title: Timed Test
timedTestPage.finalInstruction: You will get a chance to improve your score on this worksheet soon!
timedTestPage.finalScore: You scored __perScore__ on this worksheet with __varCorrect__ out of __varTotal__ correct.
timedTestPage.sparkieInfo: (You will get __noOfSparkie__ __rewardType__ if you finish this timed test successfully)
timedTestPage.finalScorePass:
You scored __per__ % on this worksheet with __right__ out of __noofques__ correct.
Congratulations - that is a great score!
timedTestPage.finalScoreFail: You scored __per__ % on this worksheet with __right__ out of __noofques__ correct.
timedTestPage.finalMsg: You will get a chance to improve your score on this worksheet soon!

timedTestPage.sparkieWon_plural: You get __noOfSparkies__ sparkie sparkies for this.
timedTestPage.rewardWon: You get __noOfSparkies__ reward points for this.
timedTestPage.endSessionMsg1: Are you sure you want to end this session?
timedTestPage.endSessionMsg2: You have not completed this test. If you end your session now, you will get this test again the next time you log in. Do you still want to end this session?
